alluxio

Interface URI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<URI>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiPartSchemeURI, StandardURI

    public interface URI
extends Comparable<URI>, Serializable
    This interface represents a URI. This URI supports more than just strict URI. Some examples: * Windows paths * C:\ * D:\path\to\file * E:\path\to\skip\..\file * URI with multiple scheme components * scheme://host:123/path * scheme:part2://host:123/path * scheme:part2:part3://host:123/path Currently, does not support fragment in the URI.

      Factory for URI.

      • isAbsolute

        boolean isAbsolute()
        Tells whether or not the URI is absolute.

        An URI is absolute if, and only if, it has a scheme component.

        Returns:
        true if, and only if, this URI is absolute

      • getBaseURI

        URI getBaseURI()
        Returns:
        the URI representation of this URI
